creditline: Gift of George and Caroline Wanstall
description: holiday greeting card with tipped-in photograph on inner left-hand page; black and white photo of ice crystal droplets on branches sticking up from ice or water printed on cream paper, with an irregular image rather like a brushstroke; greeting card printed in green, red and black; front of card has green rectangle with "FOTOSPHERE" in white text on rectangle; interior of card on right-hand page hand-written and printed: [Dec. 2007 / Dear Caroline / Season's Greetings / Happy New Year / 2008 / Many thanks for this year!! / Machiko & Koichiro / Koichiro & Machiko Kurita]
title: Holiday greeting card with photograph
